member.name: IAppxBlockMapReader.GetFile
member.summary: Retrieves data corresponding to a file in the block map with the specified file name.
member.param: The data about the file's attributes and blocks.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The specified file name does not match the name of a file listed in the block map.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapReader.GetFiles
member.summary: Retrieves an enumerator for traversing the files listed in the block map.
member.param: The enumerator of all the files listed in the block map.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapReader.GetHashMethod
member.summary: Retrieves the URI for the hash algorithm used to create block hashes in the block map.
member.param: The hash algorithm used in this block map.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapReader.GetStream
member.summary: Retrieves a read-only stream that represents the XML content of the block map.
member.param: A read-only stream that represents the XML content of the block map.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapReader
member.summary: Represents a read-only object model for block maps that provides access to the file attributes and block hashes.
